content:
path /workload/v1/stacks/stackid/workloads/workloadid/instances
operationId GetWorkloadInstances
parameters
name stackid
description A stack ID or slug
in path
required True
schema
type string
name workloadid
description An EdgeCompute workload ID
in path
required True
schema
type string
name pagerequestfirst
description The number of items desired
in query
required False
schema
type string
name pagerequestafter
description The cursor value after which data will be returned
in query
required False
schema
type string
name pagerequestfilter
description SQLstyle constraint filters
in query
required False
schema
type string
name pagerequestsortby
description Sort the response by the given field
in query
required False
schema
type string
summary Get all workload instances
responses
200
v1GetWorkloadInstancesResponse
type object
properties
paginationPageInfo
type object
properties
totalCount
type string
description The total number of items in the dataset
hasPreviousPage
type boolean
format boolean
description Whether or not a previous page of data exists
hasNextPage
type boolean
format boolean
description Whether or not another page of data is available
startCursor
type string
description The cursor for the first item in the set of data returned
endCursor
type string
description The cursor for the last item in the set of data returned
description Information about a paginated response

This is modeled after the GraphQL Relay spec to support both cursor based pagination and traditional offset based pagination
results
type array
workloadv1Instance
type object
properties
stackId
type string
description The ID of the stack that an instance belongs to
workloadId
type string
description The ID of the workload that an instance belongs to
id
type string
description An instances unique identifier
name
type string
description An instances name

Instance names are generated from their corresponsing workloads slug followed by a unique hash
v1Metadata
type object
properties
v1StringMapEntry
type string
description A string to string key/value pair
createdAt
type string
format datetime
readOnly True
description The date that a metadata entry was created
nullable True
updatedAt
type string
format datetime
readOnly True
description The date that a metadata entry was last updated
nullable True
deleteRequestedAt
type string
format datetime
readOnly True
description The date an entity was requested to be deleted
nullable True
version
type string
description A metadata entrys version number

Metadata versions start at 1 when they are created and increment by 1 every time they are updated
description Metadata associated with an entity
workloadv1Location
type object
properties
name
type string
description A human readable location name
city
type string
description A locations city
cityCode
type string
description A locations city expressed as an IATA airport code
subdivision
type string
description A locations subdivision
subdivisionCode
type string
description A locations subdivision code
country
type string
description A locations country
countryCode
type string
description A locations ISO31661 alpha2 country code
region
type string
description A locations state or province
regionCode
type string
description A locations ISO31662 region code
continent
type string
description A locations continent
continentCode
type string
description A locations continent code
latitude
type number
format double
description A locations geographic latitude
longitude
type number
format double
description A locations geographic longitude
description Geographic location information
workloadv1InstanceInstancePhase
type string
default INSTANCEPHASEUNSPECIFIED
description An instances startup state

 INSTANCEPHASEUNSPECIFIED StackPath is unable to determine the instances startup state
  STARTING The instance is still initializing
  RUNNING The instance is running
  FAILED The instance failed to start
  COMPLETED The instance finished running
  SCHEDULING The instance is being scheduled
  STOPPED The instance is stopped
ipAddress
type string
description An instances IP address
externalIpAddress
type string
description An instances publicly accessible IP address
createdAt
type string
format datetime
description The date an instance was created
startedAt
type string
format datetime
description The date an instance was started
deletedAt
type string
format datetime
description The date an instance was deleted
networkInterfaces
type array
workloadv1NetworkInterfaceStatus
type object
properties
network
type string
description A network interfaces name
ipAddress
type string
description A network interfaces primary IP address
ipAddressAliases
type string
description Additional IP addresses bound to a network interface
gateway
type string
description A network interfaces gateway address
description Network interfaces that are attached to an instance in a workload
description An instances network interfaces
v1ResourceRequirements
type object
properties
v1StringMapEntry
type string
description A string to string key/value pair
description Resource requirements for an object

Resource requirements are key/value pairs
v1ContainerSpecMapEntry
type object
v1ContainerSpec
type object
properties
image
type string
description The location of a Docker image to run as a container
command
type string
description The commands that start a container
v1EnvironmentVariableMapEntry
type object
v1EnvironmentVariable
type object
properties
value
type string
description An environment variables value
secretValue
type string
description A sensitive environment variable that should not be exposed
description The location to obtain a value for an environment variable
description A string to environment variable key/value pair
v1InstancePortMapEntry
type object
v1InstancePort
type object
properties
port
type integer
format int32
description The network port
protocol
type string
description The network protocol for the port

Values are either TCP or UDP Defaults to TCP
enableImplicitNetworkPolicy
type boolean
format boolean
description Allow the internet to connect to the port

When true this port will be given an implicit network policy of priority 65534 permitting 0000/0 access to the port This can be overridden by creating network policies of a higher priority to block the port
description A named port for an instance of a workload
description A string to network port key/value pair
v1Probe
type object
properties
v1HTTPGetAction
type object
properties
path
type string
description The path portion of the URL to request
port
type integer
format int32
description The TCP port to query in the HTTP request
scheme
type string
description HTTP scheme to use in the HTTP request
v1StringMapEntry
type string
description A string to string key/value pair
description Execute an HTTP GET request against an endpoint running on an instance
v1TCPSocketAction
type object
port
type integer
format int32
description The TCP port to quert
description Connect to an instances TCP port
initialDelaySeconds
type integer
format int32
description The number of seconds after a workload instance has started before liveness probes are initiated
timeoutSeconds
type integer
format int32
description The number of seconds after which a probe times out

Defaults to 1 second Minimum value is 1
periodSeconds
type integer
format int32
description How often in seconds to perform a probe

Default to 10 seconds Minimum value is 1
successThreshold
type integer
format int32
description The minimum consecutive successes for a probe to be considered successful after having failed

Defaults to 1 Must be 1 for liveness Minimum value is 1
failureThreshold
type integer
format int32
description The minimum consecutive failures for a probe to be considered failed after having succeeded

Defaults to 3 Minimum value is 1
description A health check probe against a workload instance to determine if it is alive or ready to receive traffic
v1ResourceRequirements
type object
properties
v1StringMapEntry
type string
description A string to string key/value pair
description Resource requirements for an object

Resource requirements are key/value pairs
volumeMounts
type array
v1InstanceVolumeMount
type object
properties
slug
type string
description The slug of the volume claim to mount
mountPath
type string
description The path in an instance to mount a volume
description Describes mounting a volume on containers or vms in an instance
description Volumes to mount in the container
description The specification for the desired state of a container in a workload
description A string to container configuration key/value pair
containerStatuses
type array
v1ContainerStatus
type object
properties
name
type string
description A container status name
v1ContainerStatusContainerPhase
type string
default CONTAINERPHASEUNSPECIFIED
description Which phase of runtime a container is currently in

 CONTAINERPHASEUNSPECIFIED The container has not reported a state back or StackPath is unable to determine the containers state
  STARTING The container is starting up
  RUNNING The container is running
  FAILED The container has terminated due to a failure
  STOPPED The container was terminated by the user
startedAt
type string
format datetime
description The date a container started
finishedAt
type string
format datetime
description The date a container terminated
ContainerStatusWaiting
type object
properties
reason
type string
description The reason that a container is waiting to start
message
type string
description A more detailed explanation of a containers waiting state
description Properties related to containers that are starting up
ContainerStatusRunning
type object
startedAt
type string
format datetime
description The date a container started
description Properties related to running containers
ContainerStatusTerminated
type object
properties
exitCode
type integer
format int32
description The exit code of the command that started the container
reason
type string
description The reason a container terminated
message
type string
description A more detailed explanation of a containers termination
startedAt
type string
format datetime
description The date a container started
finishedAt
type string
format datetime
description The date a container terminated
description Properties related to terminated containers
ready
type boolean
format boolean
description Whether or not a container is running and ready for service
restartCount
type integer
format int32
description How many times a container has restarted since it was first started
containerId
type string
description A unique value that identifies a container
description The status of a container in a workload
description Status of the containers running within the workload instance
v1VirtualMachineSpecMapEntry
type object
v1VirtualMachineSpec
type object
properties
image
type string
description The image to use for the virtual machine

This is in the format of / If the image tag portion is omitted default is assumed which is the most recently created ready and nondeprecated image of that slug A set of common images is present on the stackpathedge stack
userData
type string
format base64
description Base64 encoded cloudinit compatible userdata

Values are either TCP or UDP Defaults to TCP
enableImplicitNetworkPolicy

When true this port will be given an implicit network policy of priority 65534 permitting 0000/0 access to the port This can be overridden by creating network policies of a higher priority to block the port
description A named port for an instance of a workload
description A string to network port key/value pair

type string

description Describes mounting a volume on containers or vms in an instance
description Volumes to mount in the virtual machine
description The specification for the desired state of a virtual machine in a workload

virtualMachineStatuses
type array
v1VirtualMachineStatus
type object
properties
name
type string
description The name of the virtual machine the status applies to
VirtualMachineStatusPhase
type string
default UNKNOWN
reason
type string
description A short reason why the virtual machine is in its current phase
message
type string
description A longer message with details about why the virtual machine is in its current phase
description The status of a Virtual Machine
description The status of the virtual machines running within the workload instance
reason
type string
description A short reason that explains why an instance is in a phase
message
type string
description A longer message that provides more detail on why an instance is in a phase
scheduledAt
type string
format datetime
description The date an instance was scheduled
description An instance of a workload deployment
description The requested workload instances
description A response from a request to retrieve a workloads instances
